summary: Completed P0 health endpoints testing and Golden Path E2E smoke test validation. Health endpoints working perfectly. Frontend login/logout flow functional but missing required data-testid attributes for automated testing.

integration_issues.issue: Login form elements missing data-testid attributes required by smoke test
integration_issues.workaround: Elements accessible via alternative selectors (#email, #password, button[type='submit'], text=Logout)

passed_tests: GET /api/v1/readyz returns ready with database connected, redis skipped
Frontend login flow works with admin@casino.com credentials
Logout functionality works and redirects to login page

success_percentage.frontend: 80% - Core functionality works but E2E test selectors missing

action_item_for_main_agent: Add missing data-testid attributes to frontend Login.jsx and Layout.jsx components to enable Playwright smoke test. The deployed frontend is missing: data-testid='login-email-input', data-testid='login-password-input', data-testid='login-submit-button', data-testid='sidebar-logout-button'. Core functionality works but automated testing is blocked.
